About Me

Hi, my name is Benjamin Ropple. I'm an electrical engineering student attending the University of Maine in Orono, ME. I'm in the process of finishing the final semester of my senior year. I will be graduating in May 2020.

The projects I've worked on, my skill set, and various links are all listed on my portfolio page. A more detailed description of my skill set, along with the EE-focused college courses I've taken, are available on my LinkedIn profile.

I am searching for full-time employment. Feel free to contact me via e-mail or LinkedIn.
